name: Car looper (itch)
description:
Simple building game to the Theme "Stuck in a loop". You are the manager of this race track and have only 1 goal. Build a looping track for your cars.  Choose 1 of 4 different street parts and complete the puzzle in time. You get more score points if you use all the parts given to you in the level!  Have fun and good luck!

Controls:

Numbers 1-4 : Select streets

LeftClick: Place street

RightClick: Remove street

MouseWheel or E & R Keys: Rotate street

Track parts:

1 - Default street

2 - Curve

3- Jump: Jumps over 1 square - has to land on a flat tile

4 - Crossroads - Car always goes straight

If the audio is to low, feel free to increase it in the settings!
